name: Players Palace Slots! FREE Grand Vegas Casino of the Rich Fun House Inferno!
name_original: Players Palace Slots! FREE Grand Vegas Casino of the Rich Fun House Inferno!
description:
***THE BEST FREE-TO-PLAY SLOTS GAME***

The ultimate FREE slots game has arrived! Spin the reels and get massive payouts in the only HD Slot Machine worthy of your device! Download Player's Palace Slots and you will be rewarded with massive amounts of fun!

Premium Features

This is what makes Players Palace the only slots app you'll ever need.

- Stunning HD Graphics

- 5 reels with up to 30 lines!

- FREE Daily Credits!

- 3 deluxe Bonus Games to max your payouts!

- No internet connection required to play!

- Game Center integration - Compete against your friends and show them who's boss!

Good luck, and enjoy!
